title: Jared's Birthday
content:
Today commemorates an important day in typographic history, the birth of our very own Jared Benson. Please join me in wishing him the best on this special day. For without Jared, Typophile would not be a reality. Thanks Jared for your vision and support!   
   
Happy Birthday Jared!!!   
   
--ko
author: kolewiler

comments.content:
Jared, thank you for being born! :-)   
   
HBD,   
Hrant

Ken, you're a dead man. It's about time you posted!   
   
jb
